# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new text layout manager with the coder you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **coder**: A coder that implements [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSCoder].

## Creating a layout manager

- **init()**: Creates a new text layout manager.
